data.eml:eml: A review of the genus Hadrodemius Wood, with new synonymy and a key to species (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Beaver, Roger A. (2010): A review of the genus Hadrodemius Wood, with new synonymy and a key to species (Coleoptera: Curculionidae: Scolytinae). Zootaxa 2444: 51-57, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.294282
